data.name: Cerebral Vortex
data.oracle_text: Target player draws two cards, then Cerebral Vortex deals damage to that player equal to the number of cards he or she has drawn this turn.
data.flavor_text: Izzet brains and Izzet boilers: contents under pressure.

data.name: Djinn Illuminatus
data.oracle_text:
({U/R} can be paid with either {U} or {R}.)
Flying
Each instant and sorcery spell you cast has replicate. The replicate cost is equal to its mana cost. (When you cast it, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost. You may choose new targets for the copies.)

data.name: Electrolyze
data.oracle_text:
Electrolyze deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two target creatures and/or players.
Draw a card.
data.flavor_text: The Izzet learn something from every lesson they teach.

data.name: Gelectrode
data.oracle_text:
{T}: Gelectrode deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may untap Gelectrode.
data.flavor_text:
"Diametrically opposing energies in self-sealed plasmodermic bubbles make great pets!"
â€”Trivaz, Izzet mage

data.name: Goblin Flectomancer
data.oracle_text: Sacrifice Goblin Flectomancer: You may change the targets of target instant or sorcery spell.
data.flavor_text: Rerouting magic through a goblin's brain is the surest way to throw it wildly off course.

data.name: Invoke the Firemind
data.oracle_text:

â€¢ Draw X cards.
â€¢ Invoke the Firemind deals X damage to target creature or player.
data.flavor_text: To those in tune with the Firemind, there is no difference between knowledge and flame.

data.name: Izzet Chronarch
data.oracle_text: When Izzet Chronarch enters the battlefield, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
data.flavor_text: He ensures not only whether but also when and where the lightning strikes twice.

data.name: Izzet Guildmage
data.oracle_text:
({U/R} can be paid with either {U} or {R}.)
{2}{U}: Copy target instant spell you control with converted mana cost 2 or less. You may choose new targets for the copy.
{2}{R}: Copy target sorcery spell you control with converted mana cost 2 or less. You may choose new targets for the copy.

data.name: Leap of Flame
data.oracle_text:
Replicate {U}{R} (When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost. You may choose new targets for the copies.)
Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains flying and first strike until end of turn.

data.oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever you draw a card, Niv-Mizzet, the Firemind deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
{T}: Draw a card.

data.name: Petrahydrox
data.oracle_text:
({U/R} can be paid with either {U} or {R}.)
When Petrahydrox becomes the target of a spell or ability, return Petrahydrox to its owner's hand.
data.flavor_text: It departs through the streets' fissures with a sound like gravel pouring into a pond.

data.name: Schismotivate
data.oracle_text: Target creature gets +4/+0 until end of turn. Another target creature gets -4/-0 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text:
"I ran the experiment through the brain of a schizophrenic lab-goblin. My burners' flames fell asleep while the beakers jumped about and shattered. Success!"
â€”Myznar, Izzet psychomancer

data.name: Stitch in Time
data.oracle_text: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, take an extra turn after this one.
data.flavor_text: Quyzl was told by his mentor to "make more time" for his studies.

data.name: Tibor and Lumia
data.oracle_text:
Whenever you cast a blue spell, target creature gains flying until end of turn.
Whenever you cast a red spell, Tibor and Lumia deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.
data.flavor_text: Tracing the horizon in a dance of wind and fire.
